column1: == Explosion and fire ==
The fire was started by an explosion that occurred 2 kilometres (1.2 mi) below the surface; the explosion caused the mine's elevator to stop working. The explosion killed 301 workers
column3: and trapped nearly 600 workers in the mine
column4: causing most of the victims to die of carbon monoxide poisoning. Because the explosion took place close to shift change
column5: the exact number of employees underground at the time was initially uncertain.  Hürriyet first declared a young-looking mine worker among the dead to be 15 years old and working illegally
column6: though this claim has been dismissed by the person's family.

column1: == Rescue effort ==

Rescue crews arrived at the mine soon after the explosion and provided fresh air to the mine workings in an effort to keep those workers still trapped underground alive. Four mine rescue teams were deployed underground to look for trapped miners; however
column2: thick smoke initially hindered progress in the operations to rescue more workers from the mine.
